Saw this tip on another torrent: 

If you're on an x64 OS and you're crashing randomly and often, change the network options to Single Player.

Also, language can be changed to english by checking the DIDatagame.ini file and change:

Locale("Ru") to Locale("En")

Located towards the bottom. do NOT change the Locale(s) line.
